description:
Position : Senior Sales Manager

Industry : Telecommunications

Job Type : Full-Time, Salary & Benefits plus Commission Potential

Experience : 5-10 Years in Sales Preferred, Previous Management Experience Required

Education : BS in Business Marketing (or similar) - Preferred but not required

Overview

Snapfon is looking for a talented, self-motivated, Sales Executive. Experience in sales team management, strategic sales planning, revenue growth planning, direct sales, and corporate client/affiliate management is required. Working knowledge of cellular phones, cellular network technology and consumer products sales is a plus.

This is a full-time plus benefits position. Applicant must be a self-starter that can fit in well in a diverse team of professionals. We are looking for someone eager for the opportunity to be a valuable contributor and help grow the business.

Compensation is dependent on experience. Starting Range: $70k-$90k plus generous bonus structure.

Qualifications/Preferred Experience

Sales Strategy Implementation
• Lead sales teams with proactive sales practices
• Revenue growth planning and execution
• Ability to execute on sales plans and manage sales personnel goals and expectations

Direct Sales
• Experience with Trade-shows, Corporate Clients/Affiliates, as well as direct to consumer
• Ability to mentor and teach sales staff to develop their skills

E-commerce Sales
• Experience with e-commerce business development, sales and marketing strategies

Consumer Products & Telecommunications
• Experience with telecommunications and cellular devices or similar consumer products

Location & Travel
• Hybrid Work Environment. Minimum 3 days per week in office.
• Willingness to travel is required. Travel may be up to 20-30% of time.

What is Snapf ō n?

Snapfōn® is the principal brand of Excellus Communications LLC, a privately held small, fast-paced business based in Sioux Falls, SD. Snapfōn® handsets began production in 2010 and launched their own cellular service in 2013. The brand expanded to smartphone handsets and cellular service in 2017. We produce the easiest to see, easiest to hear, and easiest to use phone on the market, primarily targeted to hearing impaired and low vision consumers. Since 2010, we have served over 250,000 customers and provide a handset which can be purchased directly through our website, through a variety of online and mainstream cellular outlets, and through affiliate partners such as Home Medical Equipment retailers, Healthcare Facilities and Homecare Providers, for example.
